verses.verse: To the chief <WH5329> Musician <WH5329> upon Aijeleth <WH365> Shahar, <WH7842> A Psalm <WH4210> of David. <WH1732> My God, <WH410> my God, <WH410> why <WH4100> have you forsaken <WH5800> me? why are you so far <WH7350> from helping <WH3467> me, and from the words <WH1697> of my roaring? <WH7581>
O my God, <WH430> I cry <WH7121> in the day time, <WH3119> but you hear <WH6030> not; and in the night <WH3915> season, and am not silent. <WH1747>
But you are holy, <WH6918> O you that inhabit <WH3427> the praises <WH8416> of Israel. <WH3478>
Our fathers <WH1> trusted <WH982> in you: they trusted, <WH982> and you did deliver <WH6403> them.
They cried <WH2199> to you, and were delivered: <WH4422> they trusted <WH982> in you, and were not confounded. <WH954>
But I am a worm, <WH8438> and no <WH3808> man; <WH376> a reproach <WH2781> of men, <WH120> and despised <WH959> of the people. <WH5971>
All <WH3605> they that see <WH7200> me laugh <WH3932> me to scorn: they shoot <WH6362> out the lip, <WH8193> they shake <WH5128> the head, <WH7218> saying,
He trusted <WH1556> on <WH413> the LORD <WH3068> that he would deliver <WH6403> him: let him deliver <WH5337> him, seeing he delighted <WH2654> in him.
But you are he that took <WH1518> me out of the womb: <WH990> you did make me hope <WH982> when I was on my mother's <WH517> breasts. <WH7699>
I was cast <WH7993> on you from the womb: <WH7358> you are my God <WH410> from my mother's <WH517> belly. <WH990>
Be not far <WH7368> from me; for trouble <WH6869> is near; <WH7138> for there is none <WH369> to help. <WH5826>
Many <WH7227> bulls <WH6499> have compassed <WH5437> me: strong <WH47> bulls of Bashan <WH1316> have beset <WH3803> me round. <WH3803>
They gaped <WH6475> on me with their mouths, <WH6310> as a ravening <WH2963> and a roaring <WH7580> lion. <WH738>

I am poured <WH8210> out like water, <WH4325> and all <WH3605> my bones <WH6106> are out of joint: <WH6504> my heart <WH3820> is like wax; <WH1749> it is melted <WH4549> in the middle <WH8432> of my bowels. <WH4578>

My strength <WH3581> is dried <WH3001> up like a potsherd; <WH2789> and my tongue <WH3956> sticks <WH1692> to my jaws; <WH4455> and you have brought <WH8239> me into the dust <WH6083> of death. <WH4194>
For dogs <WH3611> have compassed <WH5437> me: the assembly <WH5712> of the wicked <WH7489> have enclosed <WH5362> me: they pierced <WH738> my hands <WH3027> and my feet. <WH7272>
I may tell <WH5608> all <WH3605> my bones: <WH6106> they look <WH5027> and stare <WH7200> on me.
They part <WH2505> my garments <WH899> among them, and cast <WH5307> lots <WH1486> on my clothing. <WH3830>
But be not you far <WH7368> from me, O LORD: <WH3068> O my strength, <WH360> haste <WH2363> you to help <WH5833> me.
Deliver <WH5337> my soul <WH5315> from the sword; <WH2719> my darling <WH3173> from the power <WH3027> of the dog. <WH3611>
Save <WH3467> me from the lion's <WH738> mouth: <WH6310> for you have heard <WH6030> me from the horns <WH7161> of the unicorns. <WH7214>
I will declare <WH5608> your name <WH8034> to my brothers: <WH251> in the middle <WH8432> of the congregation <WH6951> will I praise <WH1984> you.

You that fear <WH3373> the LORD, <WH3068> praise <WH1984> him; all <WH3605> you the seed <WH2233> of Jacob, <WH3290> glorify <WH3513> him; and fear <WH1481> him, all <WH3605> you the seed <WH2233> of Israel. <WH3478>

For he has not despised <WH959> nor <WH3808> abhorred <WH8262> the affliction <WH6039> of the afflicted; <WH6041> neither <WH3808> has he hid <WH5641> his face <WH6440> from him; but when he cried <WH7768> to him, he heard. <WH8085>
My praise <WH8416> shall be of you in the great <WH7227> congregation: <WH6951> I will pay <WH7999> my vows <WH5088> before <WH5048> them that fear <WH3373> him.
The meek <WH6035> shall eat <WH398> and be satisfied: <WH7646> they shall praise <WH1984> the LORD <WH3068> that seek <WH1875> him: your heart <WH3824> shall live <WH2421> for ever. <WH5703>

All <WH3605> the ends <WH657> of the world <WH776> shall remember <WH2142> and turn <WH7725> to the LORD: <WH3068> and all <WH3605> the kindreds <WH4940> of the nations <WH1471> shall worship <WH7812> before <WH6440> you.
For the kingdom <WH4410> is the LORD's: <WH3068> and he is the governor <WH4910> among the nations. <WH1471>

All <WH3605> they that be fat <WH1879> on earth <WH776> shall eat <WH398> and worship: <WH7812> all <WH3605> they that go <WH3381> down <WH3381> to the dust <WH6083> shall bow <WH3766> before <WH6440> him: and none <WH3808> can keep alive <WH2421> his own soul. <WH5315>
A seed <WH2233> shall serve <WH5647> him; it shall be accounted <WH5608> to the Lord <WH136> for a generation. <WH1755>
They shall come, <WH935> and shall declare <WH5046> his righteousness <WH6666> to a people <WH5971> that shall be born, <WH3205> that he has done <WH6213> this.
